head.title: Heat Defeats Knicks In the Final Minute

hedline.hl1: Heat Defeats Knicks In the Final Minute

block.p: Alonzo Mourning scored the game's final two baskets to give the Miami Heat an 87-83 victory over the Knicks in Game 1 of their Eastern Conference semifinal.

With the score tied at 83-83, Mourning made a layup with 41.8 seconds left in the game, then hit a jumper with 5.6 seconds left to seal the victory for host Miami. Before those two baskets, the two teams had played almost 5 minutes without scoring a field goal and had combined for only 6 free throws.
